snippet: Michael D. Shear discusses questions about Mitt Romney's counterpunch, Buzzfeed assesses the vice-presidential field, Monica Davey reports on Jesse Jackson Jr.'s political spiral, and Op-Ed columnists Charles Blow and Bill Keller discuss voter ID...
abstract: Michael D. Shear discusses questions about Mitt Romney's counterpunch, Buzzfeed assesses the vice-presidential field, Monica Davey reports on Jesse Jackson Jr.'s political spiral, and Op-Ed columnists Charles Blow and Bill Keller discuss voter ID laws.

headline.main: TimesCast Politics: Is Mitt Romney Tough Enough?
